description: Visitor Visa (Subclass 600) Tourist Stream. Note: Fees increasing to AUD 200 (Offshore) / AUD 500 (Onshore) from July 2025.

meta.max_stay: Typically 3 months per visit (can be 3, 6, or 12 months at officer discretion)
meta.passport_validity: Valid for the duration of stay (Airlines prefer 6 months validity)
meta.photo_spec: 35mm x 45mm, White background, Head & Shoulders, Taken in last 6 months
meta.min_funds_requirement: Minimum AUD 5,000 per person for a 2-week visit. Add ~AUD 1,000 per additional week. Must be liquid funds (Savings / FD / Education Loan).

documents.title: Original Passport (Scans)
documents.description: Color scans of ALL pages (Bio + all used pages) of current and old passports.

documents.title: Financial Evidence (Liquid Funds)
documents.description:
1. Last 6 months bank statements (Stamped)
2. ITR-V for past 3 years
3. Salary slips for last 3 months
*Property valuation and CA reports are not strong evidence.*

documents.title: Employment Proof / NOC
documents.description: NOC with leave approval from employer. If self-employed: GST certificate + business bank statements.

documents.title: National ID (Aadhaar)
documents.description: Color scan of Aadhaar card (front & back). Frequently requested for Indian applicants.

documents.title: Biometrics (Fingerprints)
documents.description: Mandatory: From Jan 2025, all applicants must provide fingerprints and photos at VFS Global.

documents.title: Form 54 – Family Composition
documents.description: Sometimes requested for Indian applicants. Lists all immediate family members.

documents.title: Travel Itinerary
documents.description: Tentative flight dates + hotel bookings. Do NOT purchase actual flight tickets before visa approval.

steps_flow.title: Create ImmiAccount
steps_flow.description: Create an individual ImmiAccount to lodge your Subclass 600 Tourist application online.

steps_flow.title: Start Visitor Visa (Subclass 600) Application
steps_flow.description: Select 'Visitor visa (subclass 600)' → Choose 'Tourist Stream (outside Australia)' → Begin application. Answer all history, funding, and travel questions accurately.

steps_flow.title: Upload Supporting Documents
steps_flow.description: Upload high-quality color scans (PDF/JPG under 5MB). Label files correctly e.g. 'BankStatement_Jun-Nov.pdf'.

steps_flow.title: Pay Visa Fee
steps_flow.description: Pay AUD 200 via Credit/Debit Card or PayPal. A small surcharge applies depending on method.

steps_flow.title: Book Biometrics Appointment
steps_flow.description: After payment, download the 'Biometrics Instruction Letter'. Use it to book your biometrics appointment at VFS Global (India).
